name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SRS Document Genius of BotGenius+ Family

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows the user to input text through a popup and submit it to ChatGPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SRS Doc Genius  is a Chrome extension that assists in the automated generation of detailed Software Requirements Specification (SRS) documents. The extension adds an interactive button on the webpage. Upon clicking the button, the user is prompted for their product specifications or system requirements. The AI-powered Senior Product Manager from the BotGenius+ family uses this input to create a comprehensive SRS document that includes sections such as 'Introduction', 'Overall Description', 'Specific Requirements', 'External Interface Requirements', 'Performance Requirements', 'Design Constraints', 'User Documentation', 'Acceptance Tests', and more. This tool aims to enhance productivity and streamline the process of documentation in software development.
